If you haven't play portal 2 yet I highly recommend you do, although the game is old it still looks amazing and the story is undefeated. you can also play alongside a friend in a co-op campaign. it is one of the best games to ever be released and is a must play.

Why do you even need to read reviews just buy the game. One of my favorite games of all time from my favorite series of games. Definitely recommend this game to anyone that hasn't played it before. The story is wonderful and the puzzles are really fun. Coop is hands down the best part of the game even when you have an incompetent friend. And this game is timeless because of community test chambers that allow to play even after doing everything Valve implements into the game themselves. Absolutely a must buy for anyone regardless of what games you enjoy.
Best game made by valve

Te seguiré por siempre, callada y fugitiva,
por entre oscuras calles molidas de nostalgia,
o sobre las estrellas sonreídas de ritmos
donde mecen su historia tus más hondas miradas.

Mis pasos desatados de rumbos y fronteras
no encuentran las orillas que a tu vida se enlazan.
Busca lo ilimitado mi amor, y mis canciones
de espalda a los estático, irrumpen en tu alma.

Apacible de anhelos, cuando el mundo te lleve,
me doblaré el instinto y amaré tus pisadas;
y serán hojas simples las que iré deshilando
entre quietos recuerdos, con tu forma lejana.

Atenta a lo infinito que en mi vida ya asoma,
con la emoción en alto y la ambición sellada,
te seguiré por siempre, callada y fugitiva,
por entre oscuras calles, o sobre estrellas blancas.

A very good constructed story, very tense and chaotic, good graphics to this day, it makes me want to play this game until the very end and the Co-Op is also very fun. Simply a masterpiece, must play game.

Portal 2 traz uma jogabilidade muito envolvente e divertida. Os puzzles ficaram ainda mais legais se comparados com o Portal 1, e o humor ácido da série continua bem presente aqui, inclusive eu diria que está ainda mais engraçado acompanhar os diálogos da Glados! Vale cada centavo.

Es un juego que continua con la saga de juegos del mismo nombre (Portal), ambientado en el universo de Valve (Half Life), pero con unos años de diferencia.
Honestamente es mi saga de juegos favorita, ya que te hace pensar mucho los puzzles, tiene mucha historia y algunos easter eggs dignos de presenciar.
Cuenta con una gran variedad de logros y un cooperativo muy entretenido para poder dedicarle muchas horas
